Package fun.connor.fantasy.Database

Interface DatabaseAccessObject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseAccessObjectImpl
    public interface DatabaseAccessObject
    The DatabaseAccessObject class offers a simple API that abstracts out the actual functionality of the database and its model.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Athlete> loadAllAthletes()
      This method gets all valid athletes from the database.
      Athlete loadAthlete​(java.util.UUID athleteId)
      This method loads an athlete from the database with the given ID.
      League loadLeague​(java.util.UUID leagueId)
      This method loads a league from the database with the given ID.
      Team loadTeam​(java.util.UUID teamId)
      This method loads a teamfrom the database with the given ID.
      void save​(Athlete athlete)
      This is the same as save(League) except it takes an Athlete.
      void save​(League league)
      The save method writes the desired object to the database.
      void save​(Team team)
      This is the same as save(League) except it takes a Team.

    • Method Detail

      • loadAllAthletes

        java.util.ArrayList<Athlete> loadAllAthletes()
        This method gets all valid athletes from the database.
        Returns:
        A list of all valid athletes.

      • loadAthlete

        Athlete loadAthlete​(java.util.UUID athleteId)
        This method loads an athlete from the database with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        athleteId - The ID of the athlete to be loaded
        Returns:
        A reference to the loaded athlete

      • loadLeague

        League loadLeague​(java.util.UUID leagueId)
        This method loads a league from the database with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        leagueId - The ID of the league to be loaded
        Returns:
        A reference to the loaded league

      • loadTeam

        Team loadTeam​(java.util.UUID teamId)
        This method loads a teamfrom the database with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        teamId - The ID of the team to be loaded
        Returns:
        A reference to the loaded team

      • save

        void save​(Athlete athlete)
        This is the same as save(League) except it takes an Athlete.
        Parameters:
        athlete - The athlete to be saved

      • save

        void save​(League league)
        The save method writes the desired object to the database. This method is overloaded to work with multiple types. This version takes a league.
        Parameters:
        league - The league to be saved

      • save

        void save​(Team team)
        This is the same as save(League) except it takes a Team.
        Parameters:
        team - The team to be saved
